talks.heading: Industry advisory board
talks.description: Evaluation session for improving course structure and syllabus of the MSc User Experience Design course by share the perspectives as a product designer and an associate mentor.
talks.title: Industry advisory board

talks.heading: UX & Product Design Workshops
talks.description: Design workshop with international Masters students about context exploring, problem discovery and testing methodology of product design
talks.title: UX & Product Design Workshops

talks.heading: Design Education Pattern Change Under Covid
talks.description: An international webinar for sharing strategy and methodology of design education under covid year.
talks.title: Design Education Pattern Change Under Covid

talks.heading: Design Team Reflective Lectures
talks.description: Develop series of lectures for designer as internal reflection. Evaluate design team ability based on defined problems and difficulties of different projects.
talks.title: Design Team Reflective Lectures

workExperience.heading: MySense.ai
workExperience.description:
* Senior Product Designer   \
  2023 â€“ Now\
  Define product objective and strategy. Specify design direction and deliver UX. Facilitate research, workshops, and arrange qualitative testing.

* UX Designer\
  2022 â€“ 2023\
  Specify and deliver product functionalities and UX, evaluating product features, and refining the design system.

workExperience.heading: Birmingham City University
workExperience.description:
* Associate Mentor\
  Give tutorial to MA and MSc students. Providing lectures and developing design workshops specifically for UX students.

workExperience.heading: Andy Chu Design Limited
workExperience.description:
* Product Designer & Consultant\
  Exploring UX improvements and new opportunities for businesses. Delivering product functionality with Jumar development team and providing design consultation with Futurilla Ltd.

workExperience.heading: Mermaid Studios
workExperience.description:
* UX Designer\
  Develop design thinking workshops with clients to identify new product opportunities, deliver UX for products, and establish design culture to the team.
